lead_paragraph: A young boy, a video camera, and a bank robbery gone wrong set the stage for this hip-hop musical drama. With nothing to go on but video footage, Detectives Roberts (Malik Yoba) and Brown (David Marciano) interrogate Mark (Kirk "Sticky Fingaz" Jones
